access_token.label: SheerID Access Token
access_token.comment: The token which allows your system to access the SheerID API. Obtained from the SheerID Control Center.

coupon_code_entry.label: Verify on Coupon Code Entry
coupon_code_entry.comment: If this setting is enabled, users inputting a coupon code will be prompted to verify if the price rule is conditional upon a SheerID-verified affiliation.

allow_uploads.label: Allow Uploads?
allow_uploads.comment: Allow customer to upload proof of affiliation if automated verification fails.

sandbox.label: Sandbox Mode?
sandbox.comment: Sandbox Mode facilitates integration testing. For more information, please view the SheerID Developer Center.

show_in_checkout.label: Verify in Checkout?
show_in_checkout.comment: Determine whether to prompt for verification during the checkout process. If a customer has already verified, they won't be prompted to verify again regardless of this setting.

show_in_checkout_affiliation_types.label: Affiliation Types
show_in_checkout_affiliation_types.comment: If Verify in Checkout? is enabled, this setting determines which affiliation types are accepted for verification in the checkout process.

show_in_checkout_cookie_name.label: Verify Cookie Name
show_in_checkout_cookie_name.comment: If Verify in Checkout is set to Cookie-Dependent, this is the name of the cookie which can be set to toggle the verification. The value of the cookie should be set to a comma-delimited list of affiliation types which are to be verified. View the SheerID Developer Center for information about affiliation types.
